page.title: 03BIOGRAPHY
page.content:
W T Stead : Stead was a journalist & a social reformer.15th April 1912 he was one of hundreds listed missing in the Titanic disaster. Stead was sent to prison in 1885 for the offence of buying a young girl off the streets. His object had been to draw the attention of the Salvation Army to the White Slave traffic. He was also prominent in the World Peace movement & was just pipped at the post for the 1901 Peace Race. A memorial Garden is to be set up for Stead_Ritche. Ritche pioneered talking books for the blind.
CLUBS There are 5 clubs in our area: a)Pot Black b)Hayling Is. Sailing c)Bennets d)Dilkusha e)Solent Club the following questions were asked to each club & the replies recorded:
